heroHeadline: MT4 Expert Advisor Development in Awoshie
heroSubheadline: Turn your trading strategy into a 24/7 automated profit machine with custom MT4 EAs built by Ghana's leading trading technology experts.

localizedContent.intro: Located just 13km from Accra Central, TradeMetrics Pro offers professional MT4 Expert Advisor development services to traders in Awoshie and across Greater Accra. Western residential community Whether you're a forex trader, financial professional, or business looking to automate your trading strategy, our expert MQL4 developers create powerful, reliable trading bots tailored to your exact specifications. Serving Awoshie's trading community, we understand the unique needs of Ghanaian traders and build EAs that work seamlessly with local and international brokers.
localizedContent.whyChooseUs: As a trusted MT4 development partner serving Awoshie, we combine deep technical expertise with local market knowledge. Our team has developed over 200+ Expert Advisors for traders across Ghana, from individual forex traders to institutional clients. We understand the challenges of trading from Ghana - connectivity issues, broker limitations, timezone considerations - and build EAs that overcome these obstacles. With our strong presence in the Accra area, we're always accessible to Awoshie clients for consultations and support.
localBenefits: Understanding of local forex brokers and market conditions
Payment options in both USD and GHS
Experience with local internet connectivity challenges
Same-day response to urgent EA issues

serviceHighlights: Backtesting on 5+ years of historical data

process.title: Free Strategy Consultation
process.description: We discuss your trading strategy, rules, indicators, and risk parameters in detail. Whether you're in Awoshie or anywhere in Ghana, we can meet in person or consult via WhatsApp/Zoom.

process.title: Custom MQL4 Development
process.description: Our expert developers build your EA with clean, optimized code following best practices. We keep you updated throughout the development process with regular progress reports.

process.title: Rigorous Backtesting
process.description: We test your EA on years of historical data, optimize parameters, and ensure it performs reliably across different market conditions.

process.title: Delivery & Training
process.description: Receive your EA files (.ex4 and .mq4 source code), comprehensive user manual, installation guide, and personalized training on how to use your new trading bot.

process.title: Ongoing Support
process.description: 30 days of free support and minor adjustments. We're here to ensure your EA performs exactly as expected.

faq.question: How long does MT4 EA development take for Awoshie clients?
faq.answer: Most custom EAs are completed within 2-4 weeks depending on complexity. Simple strategies may be ready in 1-2 weeks, while advanced multi-indicator systems may take 4-6 weeks. We provide realistic timelines during our initial consultation.

faq.question: Can you provide service to Awoshie residents?
faq.answer: Yes! We serve traders across all of Greater Accra, including Awoshie. We offer both in-person consultations (if convenient) and virtual consultations via Zoom or WhatsApp.

faq.question: Do you understand the challenges of trading from Ghana?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We've built EAs for traders across Ghana and understand local challenges like internet connectivity issues, power fluctuations, and broker limitations. We design EAs that are resilient and work reliably in the Ghanaian trading environment.

faq.question: What payment options do you accept in Ghana?
faq.answer: We accept payment in both USD and GHS via bank transfer, mobile money, and international payment platforms. We'll discuss the most convenient payment method during our consultation.

faq.question: Will I receive the source code for my EA?
faq.answer: Yes, you receive both the compiled EA file (.ex4) and the full source code (.mq4) so you can modify it in the future or have another developer make changes if needed.

faq.question: Can you convert my TradingView strategy to MT4?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Pine Script to MQL4 conversion is one of our most popular services. We specialize in accurately translating TradingView strategies to MetaTrader 4 Expert Advisors.

pricing.note: Pricing depends on strategy complexity, number of indicators, and custom features required. We provide fixed quotes after understanding your requirements.

deliverables: Compiled EA file (.ex4) ready to use
Full source code (.mq4) for future modifications
